title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Independence Day Discounts
content:
Roll into the holiday weekend with savings on vehicles, properties, and more star-spangled items. Get 40% off the Western Sovereign (Motorcycle) and Vapid Liberator (Off-Road) — two American-made icons built for tearing up asphalt and dirt. Benny’s Original Motor Works is offering 40% off all Conversion Upgrades, perfect for testing the limits of street legal requirements.

Meanwhile, serve the skies with military precision with 50% off the JoBuilt P-996 LAZER (Plane).
